oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fire at the Brown Derby Lounge
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Claiming Space
Business Districts
Fires; Nightclubs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Firefighters battling the blaze at the Brown Derby Lounge, 329-331 E. 9th Street, Chattanooga.

The Brown Derby Lounge, located at the corner of 9th and Douglas Streets, was owned by Harry Brown. In 1945, jazz singer "Miss Rhapsody" (Viola Wells) recorded a live performance at the Brown Derby Lounge.
